Title: Economize and save to support socialist construction
Publisher: People 's Bank of China, Henan branch / Zhongguo renmin yinhang Henan sheng fenhang (中国人民银行河南省分行)
Notes: Poster issued by a bank, featuring a painting by Xie Ruijie of his favorite subject, the Yellow River, titled The Yellow River is moving forward - 黄河在前进. It is dated in the top left corner, probably 1970. A painting by Xie from 1973 with the same title is in the collection of the National Art Museum of China.
